subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The American midfielder Michael Bradley beat Monday’s midnight transfer deadline in Europe and will move from Heerenveen of the Netherlands to Borussia Mönchengladbach in the German Bundesliga. Details of the transfer were not released. Bradley, 21, who had one year remaining on his contract with Heerenveen, was being pursued by clubs in England, Italy and Germany. He scored 15 league goals for Heerenveen last season.
